import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './Chat.css'; import { Avatar, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import AttachFileIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AttachFile'; import MoreVertIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreVert'; import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import EmojiEmotionsIcon from '@material-ui/icons/EmojiEmotions'; import MicIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Mic'; function Chat() { const [input, setInput] = useState(''); const sendMessage = (e) => { //to sent message } return (

Room Name

Last seen at ....

Rahul S Kumar Hi Guys 12:00pm

Rahul S Kumar Hi Guys 12:00pm

setInput(e.value)} placeholder="Type a message" type="text" value={input} />
) } export default Chat
